subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Petra Kvitova upset Maria Sharapova, 6-3, 6-4, with an array of shots and nerves of steel to become the first left-hander to win since Martina Navratilova in 1990.
snippet: Petra Kvitova upset Maria Sharapova, 6-3, 6-4, with an array of shots and nerves of steel to become the first left-hander to win since Martina Navratilova in 1990.
